name: RegistrationExample
longdesc: Given a target image and a source image with labels, perform registration and map labels from the source image to the target image

tags.name: Target
tags.hint: The anatomical image onto which you want to warp the segmentation

tags.name: Source
tags.hint: The anatomical image from which you want to warp the segmentation

tags.name: SourceSeg
tags.hint: The segmentation of the source image
